properties.name: http-method
properties.description: Type of HTTP call, POST,GET etc.

properties.name: data-reader
properties.description: Key in JSON Datasource for records.

properties.name: enable-checkbox
properties.description: Enables checkbox for each row, this allows user for multi selection.

properties.name: enable-drop
properties.description: Any node can be dropped in the tree structure.

properties.name: across-tree
properties.description: Dragging and dropping is possible across tree.

properties.name: badge
properties.description: Describes the badge value that has to be displayed tree node.

properties.name: context-menu
properties.description: Context Menu provides the list of menus on right click (for Array structure: refer typescript code in source tab)

properties.name: display-key
properties.description: Display Key provides the user defined key to parent json Array (parent key name can be changed)

properties.name: child-array-key
properties.description: Child Array Key provides the user defined key to children json object (children key name can be changed)

events.name: nodeClick
events.description: It will gives you clicked node data.

events.name: onTreeNodeChecked
events.description: It will gives whole tree data with checked flag status.

events.name: onDrag
events.description: It is fired when an element or text selection is being dragged by the user.

events.name: dragover
events.description: It is fired when an element or text selection is being dragged over a valid drop target

events.name: onDrop
events.description: It is fired when an element or text selection is dropped on a valid drop target.

events.name: rightClick
events.description: It is fired when clicked on context menu, providing tree node data and selected context menu data.

methods.name: expandAll ()
methods.description: Method to expandAll (open all Tree node) view of Tree.

methods.name: collapseAll ()
methods.description: Method to collapseAll (close all Tree node) view of Tree
